Inside the CR, AzureBlade started to feel his spark tingle with pain, 
almost as if an energon centipede was crawling on it. The pain build 
up, then, seconds after, a searing shock of energy jolted through 
him, making him scream loudly in the base.

AzureBlade: AAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRGGGHH!!!! STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPP! STOP 
IT! AAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHH!!!!!! GET ME OUT!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: forget my post if this is a sort of moding.
> 
> Predacon prgram detect the Cr's attemp to remove it. It realease a 
> discharge to Azure's spark as warning
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > What was taking him? AzureBlade seemed less patient and tolerant 
> than 
> > he ever was, but somehow, there was something deeper to it than 
> low 
> > batteries.
> > 
> > He entered a CR chamber, and hoped that it would do.
